  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse with at least 2 buttons (touchpad or Magic Mouse not recommended)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Unsupported, tested with Linux Mint 18
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse with at least 2 buttons (touchpad or Magic Mouse not recommended)
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video memory, with OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
